subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant followed a terrible shooting performance by scoring 38 points Saturday night in Salt Lake City, leading the Los Angeles Lakers to a 108-94 victory and a 3-1 series lead against the Utah Jazz.
snippet: Kobe Bryant followed a terrible shooting performance by scoring 38 points Saturday night in Salt Lake City, leading the Los Angeles Lakers to a 108-94 victory and a 3-1 series lead against the Utah Jazz.
